attributes.action: Stop the UK's funding to the World Health Organisation due to recent failings
attributes.additional_details: We are one of the top 3 funders of the inadequate organisation wasting billions for misinformation is unacceptable.
attributes.background: Stop the UK's funding to the World Health Organisation due to recent failings during the Corona Virus pandemic.  They stated that the virus was not transferred person to person and refuse to blame China for the outbreak

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314810.
